tokens.text: “Open-mindedness” can refer to a variety of qualities.
One meaning is someone who is happy to consider the views of others even if contradictory to his own.
This can be positive as one can double check one’s own conclusions.
On the other hand, such a perspective can lead someone to take the middle ground between one's view and other's from caution, and this can cause a person not to act in accordance with either view,
